alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lemhi County through 600 PM MDT... At 522 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Lemhi, or 19 miles southeast of Salmon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tendoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Idaho.
